title: fraud detection
extract: Fraud detection is a topic applicable to many industries including banking and financial sectors, insurance, government agencies and law enforcement, and more. ... Through the use of sophisticated data mining tools, millions of transactions can be searched to spot patterns and detect fraudulent transactions.

Through the use of sophisticated data mining tools, millions of transactions can be searched to spot patterns and detect fraudulent transactions.
